name: Sowin' Goblin
description:
Conquest this garden of goblins playing as one of these diverse cast of wild troublemakers.

Compete with your friends in this competitive local game (up to 4 players!)  made for the #MalagaJamWeek15 in 48 hours. 

---

Press A to join 

Hold start to begin the match

AWSD Keyboard

PAD Controller
